    • Constructor Detail

      • MovinCacheProtocol

        public MovinCacheProtocol(boolean allowCaching,
                          boolean allowSyncing,
                          double refreshRate,
                          double forcedRefreshRate,
                          double timeoutWithAvailableCache,
                          double timeout)
        Initializes a new MovinCacheProtocol with the specified caching options.
        Parameters:
        allowCaching - A value indicating whether caching is allowed according to this caching protocol
        allowSyncing - A value indicating whether the cache should be synced after it has been downloaded for the first time
        refreshRate - The refresh rate of the cache. After the time interval specified by this refresh rate the cache will be synchronized with the server. If no WiFi connection is available the cache will only be synchronized if syncWifiOnly is set to false. A value of 0 will ensure the cache is being synchronized every time the SDK is being initialized. Value is in seconds.
        forcedRefreshRate - The forced refresh rate of the cache. If the interval specified by the refreshRate has passed but no Wifi connection is available and syncWifiOnly is set to true, the cache will be synchronized anyways when the forced refresh rate has passed. A value of 0 will disable this functionality and syncing over cellular is never allowed. Value is in seconds.
        timeoutWithAvailableCache - The timeout interval for request sent out while an expired cached version of the response is available. Value is in seconds.
        timeout - The timeout interval for request sent out while no cached version of the response is available. Value is in seconds.

      • getRefreshRate

        public double getRefreshRate()
        Gets the refresh rate inn seconds. After the interval specified by this refresh rate the cache will be synchronized with the server. If no Wifi connection is available the cache will only be synchronized if syncWifiOnly is set to false. A value of 0 will ensure the cache is being synchronized every time the SDK is being initialized.
        Returns:
        The refresh rate in seconds

      • getForcedRefreshRate

        public double getForcedRefreshRate()
        Gets the forced refresh rate in seconds. If the interval specified by the refreshRate has passed but no Wifi connection is available and syncWifiOnly is set to true, the cache will be synchronized anyway when the forcedRefreshRate interval has passed.
        Returns:
        The forced refresh rate in seconds

      • standard

        public static MovinCacheProtocol standard()
        Returns:
        A default cache protocol. This protocol allows caching and does not limit syncing to wifi only. The refresh rate is set to 0 meaning the cache will be synced at every startup, but only if a wifi connection is available. The timeout for requests with available cache is set to 10 seconds. Requests without a cached response available have a timeout of 60 seconds.

      • doNotCache

        public static MovinCacheProtocol doNotCache()
        Returns:
        A do-not-cache protocol. This protocol does not allow any caching to occur, The timeout is set to 60 seconds.

      • withRefreshRate

        public MovinCacheProtocol withRefreshRate(double refreshRate)
        Returns a copy of this instance with the refreshRate set to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        refreshRate - The refresh rate of the cache. After the interval specified by this refresh rate the cache will be synchronized with the server. If no WiFi connection is available the cache will only be synchronized if the forced refresh rate is also expired. A value of 0 will ensure the cache is being syncrhonized every time the SDK is being initialized. Value is in seconds.
        Returns:
        A copy of this instance with the refreshRate set to the specified value.

If the interval specified by refreshRate has passed but no WiFi connection is available, the cache will be synchronized anyways when the forced refresh rate has passed.
